name: Cube Race (NightTerrorDev)
description:
A game where you race to the finish line, but plot twist there's cubes!

Made during the ScoreSpace Jame #19

I joined late so this is pretty basic but I feel like its a nice game and could have a lot of potential if I keep updating it, it currently only features 5 maps but that was because I was really rushed at the end, spent too much time worrying about the movement I guess.

Couldn't get LootLocker working with my timer system but maybe I'll fix that in the near future
